import React from 'react'; import HowToPlaySubtitle from './HowToPlaySubtitle.js'; import { MemberCard } from '../../Footer/MemberCard.js'; import { ChevronDown, Users, ArrowRight } from 'react-feather'; import '../../../css/about.css'; const Roleplay = (props) => { let cardStyle = { width:"98px", height:"70px", fontSize:"3px", } return (

Step 1

Decide the 6 players who will be Members of the House. The rest will be playing as Commentators.

If you don't have enough players, each Member also plays as a Commentator.

Members

Players are assigned a random Member Card and Goal Card. They also receive two Signal Tokens.

Commentators

Commentators are assigned a random Commentator Card and receive a Signal Token.

); } export default Roleplay;
